title: Email alert about new Wukong story.
body: Did anyone else get something like this? To date this is the first time i've gotten an email from riot about something like this.

replies.body: It means your a Wukong main. I got one back when they updated Pantheon's lore too.

Yeah, Nami mains (and myself) received them too! Looks like they are putting the word out to people that really enjoy a champion that's received some interesting changes :3

Do you have a lot of time spent on Wukong?

I received one email for Wukong and one for Nami, although I don't really main either of them... (my Wukong is lvl 7 mastery with 35k points and my Nami is lvl 5 mastery with 29k points)

http://imgur.com/a/zlXWP

http://imgur.com/a/YhCEA

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fmqwwejK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-26T22:04:07.103+0000)
>
> Yeah, Nami mains (and myself) received them too! Looks like they are putting the word out to people that really enjoy a champion that's received some interesting changes :3
> 
> Do you have a lot of time spent on Wukong?

I feel betrayed, I also main Nami and didn't get an e-mail.
Probably 'cause I currently spam Braum to get the last Level 7 token...
When Jinx's new lore came out I got an email about it.
It's tied to champion mastery I guess. I only got one for Nami, but she is the only champ of the vastayan group that I have on Rank 7 (toplane, obviously).
i main Ahri and got an ahri email
I got a Rengar one, so... yeah...
I got one for Ahri, but I feel like I should have gotten one for Wukong as well
Wukong main here, I got one.
